titles: A vindication of a marriage life: in answer to the Broadside against marriage.
notes: Verse: "THou dull insipid wretch, who could'st not choose ..."
In answer to "A broad-side against marriage directed to that inconsiderable annimal, called, a husband.".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
keywords: Broad-side against marriage directed to that inconsiderable annimal, called, a husband.
